item.title: Sharon add a quote by Hilary T. Smith
Sharon add a quote by Hilary T. Smith
item.description:
"Did you see that guy in the back, from the radio station?’
His smile is a jar full of fireflies.
‘Crazy Girl,’ he says. ‘All I saw was you." -- Hilary T. Smith
